options: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces

questionText: What is a component in React?
What is the purpose of state in React?
options: To manage component-specific data that can change over time
To handle routing in a React application
To define the structure of the component

questionText: What hook is used to perform side effects in a functional component?
What is the purpose of props in React?
options: To pass data from parent to child components

questionText: What is the virtual DOM in React?
options: A physical component in a computer
An in-memory representation of the actual DOM

questionText: What is the purpose of the key prop in React lists?
options: To help React identify which items have changed, been added, or been removed
To define the order of list items

questionText: What is a controlled component in React?
options: A component that controls other components
A component whose value is controlled by React state
A component that can't be modified

questionText: What is the purpose of React.memo()?
options: To optimize performance by preventing unnecessary re-renders

questionText: What is the context API used for in React?
options: To pass data through the component tree without passing props manually

questionText: What is a higher-order component (HOC) in React?
options: A component with more than 100 lines of code
A function that takes a component and returns a new component
The topmost component in the React tree
A component that uses class syntax

questionText: What is the purpose of the useCallback hook?
options: To create a new state variable

questionText: What is the difference between state and props?
options: State is immutable, props are mutable
State is for parent components, props are for child components
State is internal and controlled by the component, props are external and controlled by whatever renders the component
There is no difference between state and props

questionText: What is the purpose of the useRef hook?
options: To create a reference to DOM elements
